循.definition: to follow; to adhere to; to abide by

循序漸進.definition: in sequence, step by step (idiom); to make steady progress incrementally

循環.definition: to cycle; to circulate; circle; loop

循環使用.definition: recycle; to use in cyclic order

循環性.definition: cyclical; cyclic; circulatory; recurrent; recursive; cyclicity

循環節.definition: recurring section of a rational decimal

循環論證.definition: circular argument; logical error consisting of begging the question; Latin: petitio principii

循規蹈矩.definition: to follow the compass and go with the set square (idiom); to follow the rules inflexibly; to act according to convention
